title: How do I set the SMS center number?
answer: [[On the Messaging screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109329) and choose Settings from the displayed option menu. Choose Advanced > SMS center number, enter the SMS center number, and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109330) in the upper right corner.]()]()
